QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: mode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Landing station mode: disconnected, auto or manual

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: landingStationStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Landing Station status: unknown, open, closed, opening or closing

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: coverStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Cover status: unknown, open, closed, opening or closing

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: elevatorStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Elevator status: unknown, lift, down, is lifting or is going down

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: centeringMechanismStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Centering Mechanism status: unknown, forward, backward, is going forward or is going backward

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: droneStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Drone status: unknown, inside or outside

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: connectionStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Connection with landing station status: not avaliable, avaliable

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: chargingStatus
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Charging status: unknown, activated or disactivated

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: coverCmd
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Cover command: auto, open or close

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: chargingCmd
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Charging command: auto, start or stop
